entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
